# R√©aliser un graphique nuage des points avec `{ggplot2}`

## Important

Les graphiques avec le package `{ggplot2}` se r√©alise par couche.\
Il y a donc une importance sur les couches pour ne pas masquer des √©l√©ments.

## Masse de poussins

Utilisation du jeu de donn√©es `ChickWeight` pr√©sent de base dans R qui donne les poids de 50 poulets sur les 21 premiers jours de vie selon 4 r√©gimes alimentaires.\
Plus d'informations sur la page d'aide associ√©e `help(ChickWeight)`.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# appel du {tidyverse}
library(tidyverse)

# graphique de base
plot(ChickWeight)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# rien dessus
ggplot(data = ChickWeight)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# choix des dimension mais pas de repr√©sentation
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout de la couche points !
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight)) +
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# am√©lioration du rendu du grpahique
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-5.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout de la couleur en fonction du poussin
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Chick)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-6.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# retirer la l√©gende / erreur ordre des couches !
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Chick)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-7.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# retirer la l√©gende ok 
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Chick)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-8.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# forme des points en fonction du r√©gime
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Chick, shape = Diet)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-9.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout de la l√©gende seulement pour le type de r√©gime
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Chick, shape = Diet)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic() +
  guides(color = "none")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-10.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout de ligne
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Chick, shape = Diet)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme_classic() +
  guides(color = "none")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-11.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# si on retire la couleur
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, shape = Diet)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme_classic() +
  guides(color = "none")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-12.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout du groupe
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, shape = Diet, groupe = Chick)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme_classic() +
  guides(color = "none")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-13.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# concentration sur le r√©gime
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Diet, groupe = Chick)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-14.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# changement de couleur
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Diet, groupe = Chick)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("gold", "blue", "red", "darkgreen")) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-15.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# si on surpprime une modalit√© cela change les couleurs des suivantes donc mieux vaut utiliser un vecteur
ChickWeight %>% 
  filter(Diet != 3) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Diet, groupe = Chick)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("gold", "blue", "red", "darkgreen")) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-16.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# par vecteur
couleur <- c("1" = "blue", "2" = "darkgreen", "3" = "gold", "4" = "red")

ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Diet, groupe = Chick)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-17.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# tendance par r√©gime
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Diet)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-18.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# r√©gression lin√©aire
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Diet)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-19.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# attenuer les points
ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = Time, y = weight, color = Diet)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/base_graph_ggplot2-20.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Diff√©rence entre histogramme et diagramme en barres

## D√©finitions

**Histogramme** : Graphique permettant de repr√©senter la distribution des donn√©es d'une variable quantitative.\
**Diagramme en barres** : Graphique repr√©sentant la distribution des modalit√©s d'une variable qualitative.

## Exemples


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# histogramme du poids
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = weight) +
  geom_histogram() +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# changement du nombre d'intervalles
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = weight) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 10) +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# changement de la taille de l'intervalle
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = weight) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 10) +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout du r√©gime
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = weight, fill = Diet) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 10) +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#s√©paration des barres
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = weight, fill = Diet) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 10, position = "dodge") +
  theme_bw()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-5.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# diagramme en barres sur le poids 
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = weight) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_light()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-6.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# diagramme en barres sur les r√©gimes
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = Diet) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_light()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-7.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# 100 ligne de plus pour le r√©gime 1
ChickWeight %>% 
  count(Diet)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Grouped Data: weight ~ Time | Chick
  Diet   n
1    1 220
2    2 120
3    3 120
4    4 118
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Diagramme en barres sur les poussins
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = Chick, y = weight) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_light()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-8.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# construction somme des poids 
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = Chick, y = weight, fill = Time) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_light()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-9.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout du r√©gime
ChickWeight %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = Chick, y = weight, fill = Time, color = Diet) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_light()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-10.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# prise de poids
ChickWeight %>% 
  group_by(Chick) %>% 
  mutate(
    poids = weight - lag(weight)
  ) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  aes(Chick,y = poids, fill = Time) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_light()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/histogramme_diagramme_en_barres-11.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Graphique plus pouss√©

## Bo√Ætes √† moustaches

Explication d'une bo√Æte √† moustache

::: {.callout-note icon="false"}
Q = Quartile
:::


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
quartile <- quantile(ChickWeight$weight)

ggplot(data = ChickWeight) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(weight)) +
  geom_text(
    aes(
      x = min(weight),
      y = - 0.2 ,
      label = "Maximum entre :\nQ1 - 1,5 * (Q3 - Q1)\net Minimum (ici)"
      )
  ) +
  geom_text(
    aes(
      x = quartile[2],
      y = 0.5,
      label = "Q1\n(25%)"
    ),
    inherit.aes = FALSE
  ) +
  geom_text(
    aes(
      x = quartile[3],
      y = - 0.55,
      label = "Q2\n(50%)\nM√©diane"
    ),
    inherit.aes = FALSE
  ) +
  geom_text(
    aes(
      x = quartile[4],
      y = 0.5,
      label = "Q3\n(75%)"
    ),
    inherit.aes = FALSE
  ) +
  geom_text(
    aes(
      x = 300, 
      y = 0.2, 
      label = "Minimum entre :\nQ3 + 1,5 * (Q3 - Q1) (ici)\net Maximum")) +
  geom_text(
    aes(
      x = 350,
      y = -0.1,
      label = "Valeurs extr√™mes"
    ),
    color = "red"
  ) +
  xlim(0, 400) +
  ylim(-0.65, 0.6) +
  ylab("") +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/boite_a_moustache-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Bo√Ætes √† moustache en fonction du r√©gime


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# bo√Æte √† moustache simple
ggplot(ChickWeight) +
  aes(x = weight) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/boite_a_moustache_regime-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout du r√©gime
ggplot(ChickWeight) +
  aes(x = weight, y = Diet) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/boite_a_moustache_regime-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout de couleur du r√©gime
ggplot(ChickWeight) +
  aes(weight, y = Diet, color = Diet) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/boite_a_moustache_regime-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout des points
ggplot(ChickWeight) +
  aes(weight, y = Diet, color = Diet) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/boite_a_moustache_regime-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# montrer l'importance des couches
ggplot(ChickWeight) +
  aes(weight, y = Diet, color = Diet) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/boite_a_moustache_regime-5.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout de la transparance pour les points
ggplot(ChickWeight) +
  aes(weight, y = Diet, color = Diet) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3) +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/boite_a_moustache_regime-6.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# utilisation de la dispersion des points
ggplot(ChickWeight) +
  aes(weight, y = Diet, color = Diet) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(alpha = 0.3) +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/boite_a_moustache_regime-7.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# poids = var r√©ponse
ggplot(ChickWeight) +
  aes(y = weight, x = Diet, color = Diet) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(alpha = 0.3) +
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/boite_a_moustache_regime-8.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# Graphique combin√©

Tr√®s proche du graphique pr√©sent√© pr√©c√©demment avec plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# charger le package {GGally}
library(GGally)

# cr√©ation du graphique
ggpairs(ChickWeight, columns = 1:2, aes(color=Diet))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/graph_combine-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# ajout de la couleur choisi
ggpairs(ChickWeight, columns = 1:2, aes(color=Diet)) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/graph_combine-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# idem mais pour les courbes
ggpairs(ChickWeight, columns = 1:2, aes(color=Diet)) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = couleur)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/graph_combine-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# theme_classic appliqu√©
ggpairs(ChickWeight, columns = 1:2, aes(color=Diet)) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = couleur) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = couleur) +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/graph_combine-4.png){width=672}
:::
:::
